name: 获取股票数量
description: 获取指定交易所的股票数量
request_description: Prefix(0C) + MsgID(03000000) + Control(01) + Length(0800) + Length(0800) + Type(4E04) + Data(00 75C73301)
response_description: Prefix(B1CB7400) + Control(1C) + MsgID(03000000) + Unknown(00) + Type(4E04) + ZipLength(0200) + Length(0200) + Data(C801)

params.exchange: ExchangeSH (0x00 = 深圳, 0x01 = 上海, 0x02 = 北京)

notes: 响应数据为2字节小端序的股票数量，示例值0xC801 = 456
